text: Julien Lyneel (born 15 April 1990) is a French volleyball player, a member of the France men's national volleyball team, 2015 European Champion, gold medallist of the World League (2015, 2017). ==Career== ===Clubs=== In July 2015 he signed a one–year contract with the Polish club Asseco Resovia.PlusLiga: Julien Lyneel kolejnym wzmocnieniem Asseco Resovii Rzeszów – onet.pl – 10-07-2015 ===National team=== He debuted in the France men's national volleyball team in 2011. On 18 October 2015 the French national team, including Lyneel, achieved a title of the 2015 European Champion with a 3–0 win against Slovenia in the final.France celebrate historic European crown, Slovenia happy with silver – cev.eu – 18-10-2015 ==Sporting achievements== ===Beach volleyball=== * 2009/2010 16px French Championship ===Clubs=== * National championships ** 2015/2016 16px Polish Championship, with Asseco Resovia ** 2017/2018 16px Chinese Championship, with Shanghai Golden Age ** 2018/2019 16px Polish Championship, with Jastrzębski Węgiel * National team ** 2015 16px FIVB World League ** 2015 16px CEV European Championship ** 2016 16px FIVB World League ** 2017 16px FIVB World League ** 2018 16px FIVB Nations League ==External links== * Player profile at CEV.eu * Player profile at PlusLiga.pl * Player profile at Volleybox.net ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Montpellier Category:French men's volleyball players Category:French expatriate sportspeople in Poland Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Poland Category:French expatriate sportspeople in Italy Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Italy Category:French expatriate sportspeople in China Category:Expatriate volleyball players in China Category:Resovia Rzeszów players Category:Jastrzębski Węgiel players
title: Julien Lyneel
